title: Translate and spell-check on webpages - Toolbar Help
content: Google Toolbar for Internet Explorer has been discontinued. To get the best of the web, try Google Chrome. You can translate words or pages and check your spelling while entering text on a page. Before you can translate words or pages, you need to pick a language to translate into. After picking a language, you can translate an entire page or just words on that page. You can correct spelling mistakes while writing on various webpages.
